demoSection.title: Compare rates and ship to over 220 countries
demoSection.subtitle: Get notified when we add a new carrier or service
demoSection.customerAlertDescription: You will be notified every time we add a new carrier
demoSection.sellerAlertDescription: We will contact you with more instruction on how to become a ROK SELLER!
demoSection.whyAlirokDescription: Inspired by incredible entrepreneurs out there, we believe that growing a successful business is the way to make a difference in the world! That’s why ALIROK.com was born, a door-to-door global logistics solution. In addition to delivering products we hope to deliver a better world than we found it.
demoSection.domesticDescription: Compare real time rates & transit time from multiple carriers in a single place! Select a carrier & print your label!
demoSection.internationalDescription: Ship to & from over 220 countries using the most trusted carriers in the world. Simply print your label, we automatically issue the commercial invoice & forms for customs purposes.
demoSection.trackingTittle: TRACK EVERY STEP OF THE WAY
demoSection.trackingDescription: Real-time tracking in your finger tips.

howTo.title: Quote. Book. Ship. That Simple!
howTo.quoteSubtitle: Enter origin, destination and package details
howTo.quoteDescription: Review the rates & services and select your preferred carrier
howTo.bookDescription: Search your friends’s name or easily share link so they can enter all details.
howTo.shipSubtitle: Complete payment and print your shipping label
howTo.shipDescription: Attach the label to the package, drop-off at the nearest carrier location or select pick-up at your address.

favoriteCarriers.title: Your favorite carriers in a single place

alirokIsForEveryone.title: Alirok was made for you
alirokIsForEveryone.personalShipmentsDescription2: from multiple carriers to & from over 220 countries, saving up to 65%.
alirokIsForEveryone.personalShipmentsDescription4: keep all your shipments in a single place
alirokIsForEveryone.businessesDescription3: With a single integration you have access to all your favorite carriers to ship your products
alirokIsForEveryone.businessesDescription5: with instant competitive rates without having to negotiate a contract with each carrier
alirokIsForEveryone.carriersDescription1: BECOME A ROK SELLER AND GROW YOUR BUSINESS!
alirokIsForEveryone.carriersDescription2: Alirok will provide you the tools to automate your rates, booking, tracking, payments and customer support!

review.title: What people love about Alirok
review.personFeedback1: I love that I can compare price and transit time of all the carriers in a single quote
review.personFeedback2: Definitely the best price! Alirok saved me $400 dollars in just one shipment!
review.personFeedback3: So easy! I can literally just type my customer's name and send my package in 30 seconds.
